decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays while disrupting your opponent with taxing effects. It utilizes powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Solitude. Teferi, Time Raveler is included to control the board and protect your creatures. Arena of Glory and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional value and card advantage. The deck aims to pressure the opponent quickly while slowing down their game plan with disruptive elements to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is assembling UrzaTron, which consists of Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Tower, to generate a large amount of mana quickly. This allows the player to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Sire of Seven Deaths, as well as utilize control elements like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes removal spells like Dismember and All Is Dust to deal with threats on the board while maintaining a strong board presence.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on playing fast creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, supported by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to remove any blockers or threats from the opponent. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide additional threats and value to keep the pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Blood Moon and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan and ensure a swift victory.

This deck aims to quickly generate and maximize red mana through cards like Ruby Medallion and Pyretic Ritual in order to cast powerful spells like Grapeshot and Past in Flames multiple times in a single turn. The key strategy is to chain together spells and rituals to generate a massive amount of mana, drawing through the deck with cards like Reckless Impulse and Valakut Awakening to find the combo pieces needed to win the game in a single explosive turn. The deck also utilizes Ral, Monsoon Mage's abilities to further enhance its spellcasting capabilities.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures with disruptive spells to control the opponent's board and hand. It utilizes powerful creatures like Solitude, Overlord of the Balemurk, and Emperor of Bones to deal damage quickly. The deck also includes cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Flickerwisp and Ephemerate provide additional value by reusing key creatures or disrupting the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to pressure the opponent while disrupting their plan, leading to a quick victory.

The deck focuses on generating mana quickly through rituals and medallions, then utilizing Ral, Monsoon Mage's abilities to generate value and deal damage. The goal is to storm off by casting multiple spells in a turn, eventually finishing the game with either Grapeshot or a large Past in Flames. The deck also includes card draw and filtering to maintain consistency and find key pieces. The synergies between the various cards allow for explosive turns and overwhelming the opponent before they can react.

The deck focuses on generating mana quickly with rituals and medallions to cast spells like Past in Flames and Ral, Monsoon Mage multiple times in a turn, while also using Wish to search for key combo pieces. By chaining spells and generating additional mana, the deck can generate a storm count to either win with Grapeshot or overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells like Glimpse the Impossible. Valakut Awakening and Artist's Talent also provide card selection and advantage to help the deck find the right pieces for its combo.

This deck focuses on assembling a versatile toolbox of creatures to create powerful combos and synergies. The deck utilizes Green Sun's Zenith to search for key creatures like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician. Agatha's Soul Cauldron helps to control the board and generate advantage, while cards like Dredger's Insight and Malevolent Rumble provide card advantage and disruption. The creatures in the deck like Badgermole Cub and Delighted Halfling provide additional utility and value, enabling the deck to adapt to various situations and outmaneuver opponents.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Ocelot Pride to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. It also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Guide of Souls to support and protect the creatures. The deck also utilizes Goblin Bombardment for additional reach and removal. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Thraben Charm helps to generate card advantage and control the board. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggression, protection, and removal.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays, utilizing efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The deck also includes a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to both control the board and finish off the opponent quickly. Additional card draw and manipulation tools like Preordain and Expressive Iteration help the deck maintain its tempo and find key cards. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature damage and burn spells.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts such as Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to quickly ramp up mana and synergize with cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive threats. Cards like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat provide removal options while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler offer card advantage and disruption. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while using efficient spells and artifacts to control the board and secure a quick victory.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with removal like Prismatic Ending and Wrath of the Skies, while also generating card advantage through cards like Consign to Memory and Ephemerate. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Quantum Riddler to close out the game. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's multiple colored requirements and provide flexibility in casting spells.

The deck focuses on generating mana quickly through spells like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual to cast powerful combo cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Grapeshot. By utilizing cards like Manamorphose and Reckless Impulse, the deck aims to draw through the library efficiently to find key pieces like Past in Flames and Wish. The inclusion of cards like Artist's Talent and Valakut Awakening provide additional ways to dig for combo pieces, while also offering utility. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around quickly assembling key pieces and overwhelming the opponent with a powerful combo finish.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Cascade mechanic to consistently cast Living End as a powerful board wipe and creature revival spell. By cascading into Ardent Plea and Shardless Agent, the player can set up a big Living End play to return all creatures from the graveyard to the battlefield, while simultaneously exiling opponent's creatures. The deck also includes cards like Force of Negation and Commandeer for disruption, as well as support creatures like Curator of Mysteries and Waker of Waves to maintain board presence. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and explosive combo finish.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to establish a fast and aggressive board presence with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, while utilizing burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to control the opponent's board and close out the game quickly. The deck also aims to take advantage of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for additional pressure and win conditions. Additionally, having cards like Voice of Victory and Seasoned Pyromancer adds versatility and resilience to the deck's game plan.

This Boros Aggro deck revolves around quickly deploying threats such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, backed up by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to control the board and finish off opponents. The deck also includes powerful cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for additional aggression. With mana fixing from cards like Windswept Heath and Arid Mesa, along with disruption from cards like Blood Moon and Static Prison, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy.
